properties.entry:
INSERT INTO USER_INFO A ( A.USER_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NICKNAME , A.USER_EXP
) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , default )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?
SELECT A.LOGIN_YN , A.USER_PWD FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?

UPDATE USER_EX_ED SET COUNT = (SELECT SUM(E.COUNT + I.COUNTING) FROM USER_EX_ED E JOIN USER_EX_ING I ON(E.EX_CODE = I.ING_CODE) WHERE E.USER_ID = ? AND E.EX_CODE = ?) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND EX_CODE = ?
DELETE FROM USER_EX_ING WHERE USER_ID = ? AND ING_CODE = ?
